alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 29 at 1:10AM MST until November 29 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, bringing total snow accumulations to 8 to 16 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Icy to snow packed roadways and drifting snow will create hazardous driving conditions. Blowing snow will also significantly reduce visibility at times. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops
